import React, { useState, useContext, Fragment } from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faPlus, faMinus } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import styles from './Counter.module.css' import CartContext from '../../store/CartContext' export default function Counter(props) { const cartData = useContext(CartContext) let number = cartData.item.number const add=()=>{ cartData.addSum(props.item) } const sub=()=>{ cartData.subSum(props.item) } return (
¥ {props.item.price}
{number !==0 && ( {number} )}
) }
